content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is about compensation and it started on october 19 2011 and ended on november 21 2014 lasting for 3 years 1 month and 2 days one party is responsible for the costs of the procedure the final resolution involves dividing a house worth 150000 eur between two exspouses each party will receive a part of the house the decision was made based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the details of the court settlement are confidential and cannot be disclosed

metadata.cost: each party bears their own costs
